REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to payments in lieu of taxes for the Long Island Power Authority
Summary: Provides that for the tax year starting December 1, 2022, payments in lieu of taxes shall not equal more than two percent of the increase in total tax rate for the current tax year over the total tax rate of the prior tax rate, if any, based upon the assessed value as reflected on the final assessment roll of the current tax year.
LawCode: Amd ยง1020-q, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to payments in lieu of taxes
